data.eml:eml: New synonymy and redescription of Mastigus deustus (Thunberg) (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł (2012): New synonymy and redescription of Mastigus deustus (Thunberg) (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 3482: 68-76, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214740
